version_description:
What's new:

This release provided an opportunity to make significant performance and stability improvements, in addition to laying groundwork for upcoming features.

If you have feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com.

- Camera offline troubleshooting steps, including the ability to reboot your panel from the app
- Ongoing quality improvements and bug fixes, including an issue which caused some users to be unable to view live video from a Push Notification
If you have feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com.

- Camera offline troubleshooting steps, including the ability to reboot your panel from the app
- Ongoing quality improvements and bug fixes, including an issue which caused some users' apps to crash
If you have feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com.

- Camera offline troubleshooting steps, including the ability to reboot your panel from the app
- Ongoing quality improvements and bug fixes, including an issue which caused some users' apps to crash
If you have feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com.

What’s new:

- Chat with support in the app - Go to the support page in the app, and tap on ‘Chat with Vivint’
- Stability improvements and bug fixes

If you have feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com.

We have improved your camera experience!

Video controls: We’ve made it easier to focus on your video with redesigned controls for both live and Playback 24/7 recording. Now you can rewind to Playback recorded video right from the live view.

Notifications: Your camera notifications now include the name of the camera it came from so you know right where the action is happening.

Stability improvements and bug fixes

If you have feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com

• New in-app support for Tamper alerts
• New rule will allow you to close garage door at your preferred time
• The day has finally arrived! Smart Drive customers can now zoom on historical video through Playback
• Carguard fixes that will continue to provide a reliable and stable experience
• Stability improvements and bug fixes.

If you have feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com

• New in-app support for Tamper alerts
• New rule will allow you to close garage door at your preferred time
• The day has finally arrived! Smart Drive customers can now zoom on historical video through Playback
• Carguard fixes that will continue to provide a reliable and stable experience
• Stability improvements and bug fixes.

If you have feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com

• New in-app support for Tamper alerts
• New rule will allow you to close garage door at your preferred time
• The day has finally arrived! Smart Drive customers can now zoom on historical video through Playback
• Carguard fixes that will continue to provide a reliable and stable experience

If you have feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com

Feature Updates
• Allow users to toggle all/none in Custom Actions with multiple devices
• Carguard customers now can view severity levels of Maintenance errors

Bug Fixes
• Stability fix for demo mode on ODC Pro
• Improvements to demo mode user experience.
• Fixed authentication screen issue with Touch ID
• Fixed issues with nav bar and home image when a user accepts invite to a 2nd system
• Car Guard : Stability fixes to prevent app crashes if custom actions are created on partial setup
• Car Guard: Optimized gas gauge levels to ensure correct levels are displayed
• Car Guard: Route users to map screen on Car Guard tab
• Car Guard: "Get Help Link" now being redirected to correct FAQ page

Feature Updates
• Allow users to toggle all/none in Custom Actions with multiple devices
• Carguard customers now can view severity levels of Maintenance errors

Bug Fixes
• Stability fix for demo mode on ODC Pro
• Improvements to demo mode user experience.
• Fixed authentication screen issue with Touch ID
• Fixed issues with nav bar and home image when a user accepts invite to a 2nd system
• Car Guard : Stability fixes to prevent app crashes if custom actions are created on partial setup
• Car Guard: Optimized gas gauge levels to ensure correct levels are displayed
• Car Guard: Route users to map screen on Car Guard tab
• Car Guard: "Get Help Link" now being redirected to correct FAQ page

• Carguard customers can now create a location directly from the 'End address'
• Fixed the invalid rule bug with sunset sunrise rules.
• Fixed a bug with menu when someone signs-out
• Fixed new system invite not loading when accepted issue
• Video demo mode fixes
• Playback fixes
• Data sharing customer opt-in fix for Outdoor Camera Pro
• Other stability improvements and bug fixes

If you have any feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com.

• Carguard customers can now create a location directly from the 'End address'
• Fixed the invalid rule bug with sunset sunrise rules.
• Fixed a bug with menu when someone signs-out
• Fixed new system invite not loading when accepted issue
• Video demo mode fixes
• Playback fixes
• Data sharing customer opt-in fix for Outdoor Camera Pro
• Other stability improvements and bug fixes

If you have any feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com.

• Fixed a crash when enabling thermostat scheduling options
• Fixed a bug with demo mode occasionally being unavailable
• Fixed a bug with sharing a clip in Playback
• Fixed a bug with camera list view scrolling
• Fixed a bug with pinch-to-zoom on live video view
• Fixed a bug for Admins viewing all mobile activity for other admins
• Fixed a bug with PIN management
• Other stability improvements and bug fixes
If you have any feedback or experience any issues, please contact us at ios@vivint.com.

• Fix for 2 Factor Authentication invalid code error when user pastes code while there's another code already there (landscape mode)
• Fix for Apple Watch crash
• Fix for crash when disarming Alarm In Progress
• Fix for deter button tooltip showing incorrectly on Playback screen

Additional bug fixes and stability/UI improvements. If you have any questions or experience any problems, please reach out to us at iOS@vivint.com

• Fix for 2 Factor Authentication invalid code error when user pastes code while there's another code already there (landscape mode)
• Fix for Apple Watch crash
• Fix for crash when disarming Alarm In Progress
• Fix for deter button tooltip showing incorrectly on Playback screen
• Fix for Car Guard "last trip" always displaying at the top of the trip page (even with filters)

Additional bug fixes and stability/UI improvements. If you have any questions or experience any problems, please reach out to us at iOS@vivint.com

• Fix for iPad crash when tapping deter on/off model on DBCPro
• Fix for app crashing when navigating to hub WiFI settings when panel has no WiFi network
• Fix for car guard not showing in vehicle permission when unplugged
• Fix for playback event markers missing from recordings
